title: Customized Mobile Microlearning for Enhancing English-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Skills

context.prior_knowledge: English reading proficiency at or above secondary level and grasp of fundamental mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Customized education for professionals specializing in solving English-language math problems frequently encountered in their work.

learning_goals: Learners can interpret math problems presented in English with 80% accuracy
Learners can apply three or more math problem-solving strategies based on individualized feedback
Learners can autonomously engage in microlearning sessions (10-minute units) via mobile environments five or more times per week

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
